roleset.name: select from a group, plucking
roleset.note: PICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pick' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class get-13.5.1, other framed membersinclude buy, call, catch, earn, find, gain, get, hire, order, pull,reach, win. Comparison with 'get'. (from pick.01-v)
PICKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, pick-v.01.Corresponds to VNcls get-13.5.1. (from picking.01-n)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Since the value of its assets wasn't known, analysts-1 were free *trace*-1 to pick a number.

example.name: benefactive, sorta
example.text: The 486 is the descendant of a long series of Intel chips that began dominating the market ever since IBM picked the 16-bit 8088chip for its first personal computer.

example.name: with group
example.text: John picked a mismatched pair of socks from the pile on his floor.
example.arg: from the pile on his floor

example.name: special case: pick apples (or crops in general)
example.src: special case: pick apples (or crops in general)
example.type: special case: pick apples (or crops in general)
example.text: Mr. Auvil, razor sharp at 83, has picked and packed a zillion pecks of apples over the past 65 years.

example.name: args 0 ,1
example.text: CBC Tells Obama They Are ?Disappointed? In His Picking A Mostly White Cabinet.

roleset.name: work at with long slender instrument

example.name: Idiom: pick brains
example.text: [Everyone]-1 wants *PRO*-1 to pick Jon 's brain on this year's American Idol .

example.name: you can pick your friends...
example.text: When we go there, it's quite different from these Hollywood places where the sandwiches are spread out on the table and thepeople are picking their noses.''

roleset.name: pick at, take small pieces out of
roleset.note: PICK-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in Webtext-SEL. VerbNet entry chew-39.2-1. Framed by Claire. (from pick.10-v)

example.name: Connative alternation
example.text: She picked at her pasta lifelessly as her sister droned on and on about new hair clients that were coming to the house.
example.arg: as her sister droned on and on about her new hair clients...

example.name: pick at
example.text: Red tractors gingerly picked at the rubble while jackhammers tried to break up some of the massive slabs of concrete.
example.arg: while jackhammers tried to break up some of the massive slabs of concrete

roleset.name: pick on: bully
roleset.note: PICK_ON-V NOTES: WSJ doesn't seem to show this construction. (from pick.02-v)

example.name: straightforward
example.text: Mary picks on John relentlessly.

roleset.name: select from a group
roleset.note: PICK_OUT-V NOTES: otherwise identical to "pick" above (from pick.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: made up
example.text: John picked out a bunch of flowers from the pile in the dumpster.
example.arg: from the pile in the dumpster

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: Thus the band-wagon psychology of recent days picks up new impetus.
example.arg: the band-wagon psychology of recent days

example.name: with price
example.text: There, on one of his first shopping trips, Mr. Paul picked up several paintings at stunning prices.
example.arg: on one of his first shopping trips

example.name: pushing the metaphor
example.text: When the announcement came out, ``I picked up the phone and said, `Why don't you come to us?''' Mr. Spielvogel said.

example.name: other args
example.text: John picked up a box of chocolates from the grocer for Mary.

roleset.name: pick up: increase
roleset.note: PICK_UP-V NOTES: Actually, I doubt this will show start/end points. (from pick.05-v)

role.descr: amount increased by, EXT or MNR

example.name: basic
example.text: If sales don't pick up, the cuts will go deeper and incentives will sprout again.

example.name: person as event
example.text: Skipping personal pleasantries, Mr. Lee picked up exactly where he left off several months earlier -- before the governmentcrackdown in China -- when he had warned that the orthodoxleadership in Beijing feared a plurality of views.
example.arg: exactly where he left off several months earlier -- before the government crackdown in China -- when he had warnedthat the orthodox leadership in Beijing feared a plurality of views

roleset.name: discover, spot, find, notice
roleset.note: PICK_UP-V NOTES: compare to discover.01 (from pick.11-v)

example.name: Medical procedure as Arg0
example.text: Routine mammogram picked up mass in right breast.

example.name: with redundant particle
example.text: Desperate, he has called in the Libyans to help fight the rebels of the Somali National Movement in the north, which is onlyone of several groups picking away at the regime in the capital ofMogadishu.
example.arg: at the regime in the capital of Mogadishu

example.name: no source
example.text: But Saatchi's troubles have only whipped up interest among outsiders-1 interested [*]-1 in [*]-1 picking off pieces of its adbusinesses.

roleset.name: pick_off: target and eliminate from a distance, like a sniper

example.name: Both args, with CAU
example.text: Who knows .. maybe they 'll send a drone *PRO* to pick you off for not getting your " flu shot " ..

example.name: With DIR
example.text: A sharpshooter named Rockholt picked him off from 300 yards.
